茰字的基本解释

茰
yú
古同“萸”。

茰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yú］
［《廣韻》羊朱切，平虞，以。］
亦作“茰1”。
茱萸。

茰字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　茰； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1028第26
【唐韻】羊朱切【韻會】容朱切【正韻】雲俱切，?音兪。【說文】茱萸也。【集韻】椒子聚生成房貌。【禮·內則】三牲用藙。【註】藙，煎茱萸也。【風土記】九月九日，折茱萸房揷頭，可辟惡氣。　又地名。【水經注】邵陵水東北出益縣，其閒逕流三峽，名爲茱萸江。　又【唐書·王維傳】輞川別墅有茱萸沜。　又【集韻】雙雛切，音毹。義同。　又同?，薜萸，草名。

茰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
茰字的起名意思

暂无。

[①]［yú］
["Guangyun" Yang Zhuqie, Pingyu, to. ]
Also known as "茰1".
Cornel.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Jian Characters] 　茰; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1028 Page 26
[Tang Yun] Sheep Zhuqie [Rhyme Meeting] Rong Zhuqie [Zheng Yun] Clouds are all cut,? Yin Yu. [Said the text] Cornel also. 【Ji Yun】The appearance of the house is formed by the gathering of peppers. 【Li·NeiZe】Three animals are used for saints. 【Note】Fried cornel also. [Fin Tu Ji] On September 9th, fold the cornel house to ward off evil spirits.　Also place name. [Water Scripture Note] Shaoling River flows out of Yi County in the northeast, and its idle runoff is called Zhuyu River.　[Tang Shu·Wang Wei Chuan] There are Zhuyu in Wangchuan Villa.　[Jiyun] Double chicks cut, sound 毹. The same meaning.　Same again?, 薸蜸, cursive name.
